definition.name: Alert
definition.purpose: Display a styled alert message with optional icon, title, and description.
definition.description: A flexible and accessible alert component that can be used to show important messages, warnings, or errors. Supports different visual variants (default, destructive) and can be customized with additional content, icons, and styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the alert container.

variant.description: The visual style of the alert. Can be 'default' or 'destructive'.

initial.data: No alert content is shown by default.

visible: Empty alert container with default styling
enabled: All props can be set by the parent

when.description: The parent component renders the Alert with children or slot content.

visible: Alert container with children content, optional icon, title, and description

effects: Alert message is displayed to the user

visible: Alert with default background and text color
Alert with destructive background and text color

effects: Alert visually indicates a destructive or error state

definition.visualLayout: A bordered, rounded container with optional icon, title, and description, arranged in a grid layout.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses class-variance-authority for variant styling and a utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props and can be extended with custom content.

definition.name: AlertTitle
definition.purpose: Display the title of an alert message.
definition.description: A subcomponent for rendering the title of an alert, styled for prominence and accessibility. Should be used inside an Alert component.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the alert title.

initial.data: No title is shown by default.

enabled: All props can be set by the parent

when.description: The parent component renders AlertTitle with children.

visible: Title text is shown in the alert

effects: Alert title is displayed to the user

definition.visualLayout: A single-line, bold text element within the alert grid layout.
definition.implementationNotes: Should be placed as a child of Alert. Accepts all div props and can be styled further.

definition.name: AlertDescription
definition.purpose: Display the description or detailed message of an alert.
definition.description: A subcomponent for rendering the description or additional details of an alert. Should be used inside an Alert component, typically below the title.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the alert description.

initial.data: No description is shown by default.

enabled: All props can be set by the parent

when.description: The parent component renders AlertDescription with children.

visible: Description text is shown in the alert

effects: Alert description is displayed to the user

definition.visualLayout: A multi-line, muted text element within the alert grid layout, typically below the title.
definition.implementationNotes: Should be placed as a child of Alert. Accepts all div props and can be styled further.
